Package com.atakmap.android.cot

Class CotMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.atakmap.android.cot.CotMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent, CommsMapComponent.DirectCotProcessor, CotServiceRemote.CotEventListener, ReportingRate.Callback
    public class CotMapComponent
extends AbstractMapComponent
implements CotServiceRemote.CotEventListener, CommsMapComponent.DirectCotProcessor, ReportingRate.Callback
    Per-MapItem properties * entry - always "CoT"

      • addAdditionalDetail

        public void addAdditionalDetail​(java.lang.String detailName,
                                CotDetail detail)
        Allows for a Self SA (PPLI) message to contain additional dynamically registered information. This detail can be modified by the client without having to add it again to the self marker.

      • removeAdditionalDetail

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the detail that was removed or null if no detail was removed

      • getParallelInternalDispatcher

        public static CotDispatcher getParallelInternalDispatcher()
        Get a CotDispatcher configured to dispatch internal CoT on the parallel processing pipeline. The method returns immediately after dispatch and does not wait until processing is finished.
        Returns:
        CotDispatcher instance for parallel CoT pipeline

      • getParallelWaitInternalDispatcher

        public static CotDispatcher getParallelWaitInternalDispatcher()
        Get a CotDispatcher configured to dispatch internal CoT on the parallel processing pipeline. The method blocks until the dispatched CoT is processed.
        Returns:
        CotDispatcher instance for parallel CoT pipeline

      • getServerContacts

        public java.util.List<ServerContact> getServerContacts​(java.lang.String connectString)
        Get list of server contacts, for servers that this device has connected to, at least once since ATAK startup. Does not reach out to server, rather checks cached contacts
        Parameters:
        connectString - Pass null to get contacts for all servers
        Returns:
        the list of server contacts for a given server.

      • getServerContact

        public ServerContact getServerContact​(java.lang.String connectString,
                                      java.lang.String uid)
        Given a connection string and a uid return the server contact for a server
        Parameters:
        connectString - the connection string for a specific server or null for all the servers
        uid - the uid for the contact
        Returns:
        the server contact or null if none can be found.

      • getServerCallsign

        public java.lang.String getServerCallsign​(java.lang.String connectString,
                                          java.lang.String uid)
        Given a connection string and a uid return the callsign for the user on the server
        Parameters:
        connectString - the connection string for a specific server or null for all the servers
        uid - the uid for the contact
        Returns:
        the callsign for the user on the specific server or null if not found

        Returns:
